extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: Mask
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a bitmap where each bit set in the Mask attribute corresponds to an alarm that SHALL be enabled.

attributes.name: Latch
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a bitmap where each bit set in the Latch attribute SHALL indicate that the corresponding alarm will be latched when set.

attributes.name: State
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a bitmap where each bit SHALL represent the state of an alarm.

attributes.name: Supported
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a bitmap where each bit SHALL represent whether or not an alarm is supported.

parameters.description: This command resets active and latched alarms (if possible).
This command allows a client to request that an alarm be enabled or suppressed at the server.

parameters.valueRange: ActiveAlarms: AlarmBitmap, InactiveAlarms: AlarmBitmap, CurrentMask: AlarmBitmap, NewState: AlarmBitmap
parameters.description: Reports changes in alarm status with full context
